publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2702 Mr Mike Rumbles: Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Bill.
S1M-2702 Mr Mike Rumbles: Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Bill.
S1M-2702 Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Bill (lodged on 5 February 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
